I would recommend this company to others planning a home renovation.

I’m not one to typically post a review, but after our recent experience with American Home Improvement and specifically our project manager Neev Kugel, I felt obliged to comment on their phenomenal work.  We contracted them to remodel our kitchen as well as re-do the flooring in adjacent rooms and other related improvements.  I was extremely impressed by how professional Neev and the whole operation was from start to finish.  Outside of knowing we wanted to update our kitchen, my wife and I really didn’t have a clear vision on exactly how we wanted it to look.  We essentially put our faith and trust in Neev to deliver an end product that we would love and he didn’t disappoint.  At the start of the project, Neev brought in designers who were very knowledgeable, creative and receptive to our ideas to help create a contemporary and elegant design that both my wife and I loved.  From there, Neev developed the project plan and timeline that was consistent with the original estimate.  
Throughout the entire process, Neev was very communicative and would always clearly outline next steps so we knew what to expect.  This made the process much smoother and reduced the typical frustration that can come with remodels because we always knew the status of the work.  

Now this is not to say the project was completed without any snags.  As with any project, there were surprises that came up.  However, Neev always worked with us to explain the issue, outline our options, and would work with us to make sure we were happy with the final outcome. All of the workers brought into our home showed the same level of professionalism and quality craftsmanship.  Most importantly, the final outcome of the remodel was outstanding.  Not only was everything completed on-time and on-budget, but it turned out absolutely stunning exceeding our expectations.  And as the say, the devil is in the details, and it was the details where the quality of the work came through.  It was clear that they do not cut corners.  The quality of the work was beyond reproach.  

In terms of price, we didn’t do much comparison shopping before going with AHI.  Neev impressed us when we initially brought him in so we didn’t get other bids for the project.  I can say anecdotally the price was very comparable to what some of our other friends paid for similar work.  And most importantly the price originally agreed to is was we ultimately paid, which is very important to me.  No bait and switch.   

All in all, I would highly recommend Neev and AHI if considering a home improvement project.

Excellent home remodeling company. They recently remodeled our kitchen and we really are very satisfied with the outcome. Eli was our project manager and he was very helpful. He also resolved some issued and made a project very simple although it wasn't at all. They finished the kitchen within promised time and we are very impressed with their quality of work. Thank you American Home Improvement!

American Home Improvement just completed our bathroom and patio remodel and we could not be happier. Neev Kugel was our project manager and he is an absolute gem. He always got back to me, no matter how trivial my question or concern might have been.  As this was our first remodel, Neev helped us design, select and accent our remodel by leading us in the right direction. We absolutely love our tile and Neev provided a specific shopping list that allowed us autonomy to select our own designs, while helping us avoid unnecessary expenses. 

The crew of artisans Neev brought in to do the work were amazing. From the demolition crew to the tile guys, they were all professional and clean. They arrived on time and were courteous and helpful. They went out of their way to be sure we were happy with the results and had us view everything as it was completed to be sure we were satisfied. Anything that needed to be addressed was handled right away and to our complete satisfaction. 

As I said in the beginning, we could not be happier with the whole experience. Neev and his crew turned an old, outdated bathroom in to a serene and relaxing place to be. It turned out exactly as I wanted, as Neev understood my vision and guided us in the right direction. We would not have what we do today were it not for him.

I can only say positive things about my experience with American Home Improvement. My remodel was performed above my expectations by a very qualified and talented design and remodeling team.

merican Home Improvement did complete makeover of my garage.Shawn did great job, he was very helpful and very carefull to make sure everything will fit perfectly. Very satisfied with the job American Home Improvement did with our bathroom remodel. The American Home improvement was one of 4 other contractors we've contacted and by far they were the most competitive. They did absolutely amazing work. Do not trust this company.  The project started out well but quickly became a nightmare. This large company hires out contractors to get work and doesn't seem to check these contractors experience.  The guy that I learned later was a great salesman, but didn't know how to create a simple footing.  I had to correct his formwork! Then after he promised to prove himself, he failed again and the rebar was all wrong.
 I asked AHI for a new contractor.  They agreed and would keep promising to fix the same issue. 4 different people were sent out over 3 weeks and each one didn't speak to the previous one and knew nothing about the project. They all agreed that the work by the first contractor was not correct, but each crew also contradicted each other. It's like they didn't even know who came out before and I would have to explain what is going on.
 AHI would promise again and again to correct the issue and each time they failed. I have worked in the construction industry on large and small projects for over 10+ years.  I have never experienced any company with such a lack of communication and incompetence.  DO NOT HIRE AHI.

WONDERFUL KITCHEN REMODEL  AHI is an excellent company that strives to fully satisfy. Thank God for a great company. Nick came out & they did a complete redesign/renovation of our home (aprox 3000 sq ft.). Amazing attention to detail and incredibly responsive. My new kitchen was remodeled and supervised by American home improvement under Elad. We truly love American home improvement! We had a wonderful time during the remodeling work that they did at our house and we highly recommend this company! American home improvement remodeled completely our kitchen and laundry room and it came out gorgeously. We found American home improvement through online website. We hired American home improvement for our entire house remodeling. We recently purchased this house and it was in an immediate updates. I hired American Home Improvement for the remodeling project of my master closet, master bathroom and mainly the kitchen. American home improvement has completed several projects in our house including the remodeling of our guest bathroom, master bathroom, kitchen and living room area. The design and remodeling was a custom European style/modern while the bathroom included a walk in tile shower, jet shower system, home automation and more… part of the design was to reposition the door opening for a much better use of space. American home improvement staff helped us by selecting all of the finish materials including the tiles, upper and lower cabinets, accessories and more… including the color/style of the paint. David included also in his work the remodeling of the guest bathroom, drywall, type of texture, baseboards etc. He has excellent, professional craftsmanship and creativity skills. We definitely recommend American home improvement and all the involved people that worked at our house for any type or style of construction or remodeling projects. American Home Improvement and our project manager, Elad, have done a gorgeous remodeling job on our open space concept kitchen remodeling. We must admit that we are not easy clients! As part of our remodeling project, we removed several load bearing walls and installed new beams within the ceiling, poured concrete footings under the house, installed new hardwood floors from the living room into the kitchen and matched the drywall on the walls and ceiling in order to achieve a perfectly flat client and everything went smoothly. During the work, we lived at the house and the workers sealed off all the spaces that were not part of the work so the dust that we were so concerned of… was kept to minimum. Elad also made sure to stick to the main budget and the promised timeline (which was very important to us). We were warned by some friends that these days it’s very hard to find a good company that will provide the same service as we got from American Home Improvement! We are looking forward to hire them for additional projects in the future!

We had several meetings with Shean from American home improvement regarding to the kitchen that we want to remodel and what is our vision and goals. After he heard our thoughts, requests and fears, he came up with an incredible, open space kitchen and dining room area that came out much more stunning than we imagined. Not only does our new space look spectacular, it’s unique and very functional. Remarkably, Shean and all the people that were involved in our remodeling project, were professionals, hard-working people who really showed us that they care and treated it like it was their own home. If we summarized our remodeling project, we will say that Daniel is the person that you will want to manage your remodeling project!!!!! we can’t write enough about his personality and working crew. We hired Shean and his professional workers to remodel our master bathroom. The inside walls were replaced as well, new tile floor have been installed and the bathroom got new fresh paint. After all of that was completed, Shean start to install the new tub, and then the floor was grouted and polished. I must mention that their skills, involvement, approach and ability to achieve the goals & stay within the budgets while working with other sub-contractors was outstanding. The finished project is beautiful and perfect. We would highly recommend this company, as well as Shean and his crew.

I hired American home improvement to re-do my entire house that I recently purchased and planned to live in. "Exceptional, skilled, superb craftsmanship" are just the little good words that we can write here that can define our experience with American home improvement. The guys at American home improvement were wonderful, we got from them the best deal for our remodeling project and we are very happy with how it came out. American home improvement did several sections at my house including the remodeling of my master bathroom, 2 Additional bathrooms and paint the entire house. I hired American home improvement to finally bring the backyard of my house to life. The empty lot in the back yard was the same way I got it when I purchased the new house from the builder and all it had was just dirt. This project was pretty challenging because of the semi small space, shaped and slightly irregular. American home improvement was able to provide me with several estimates and options and all of this in order to help me get the ‘feeling’ of prices based on several levels of items and quality in hard-scape, soft-scape and lighting. This method of service allowed me to make better choices on areas to enhance or compromise in order to stay within budget. My past experiences with landscapers was not good and it made it harder for me to make a decision in hiring anyone to this project. My past experience showed me that whoever you hire, they will be either good at one thing or not that good at the other one, rarely can you find someone that will be goo in both AND mostly they never finish anything when they say they're going to. My experience with American home improvement was completely different and positive. Ben was especially knowledgeable about both hard and soft-scape and provided intuitively good recommendations. I was most impressed with the professionalism and hardworking ethic of the actual crew that did the work. They arrived on time every day, were polite and cleaned up after themselves each day. They take pride in their work and it shows. American home improvement did such a good job. I will hire them again for any future landscaping needs.

Based on several recommendations and help from friends about this company, I decided to go ahead and hire American home improvement to remodel my 2 bathrooms and kitchen. During each one of the steps in the remodIsaacng, Isaac (the owner) informed me and communicate with me about what is happening , what is going to happened and he always responded to my emails, calls or even texts and my feedback about some of the things that the workers did that day or about to do. The teams at American home improvement that worked at my house, did a great job as well and they put a lot of attention in order to make everything in perfect condition and without mistakes, thanks to Juan and all of the others. Finding a contractor for me was the most stressful part of the remodeling. I have contacted a lot of companies knowing I will be investing on my savings. My experience with AHI couldn’t be any better. With a little hesitation because of budget issues, I called this company from a local

My home is over 10 years old and we finally decided to do a kitchen update. I hired American home improvement to design and implement the new kitchen and make it practical for us. I highly recommend American home improvement to for any quality of home remodeling and dealing with creative, professionals and skilled people. We had a great pleasure to hire and allow American home improvement to work at our house and Mae and the workers for the recent kitchen and guest bathroom remodeling. The main points according to our experience with them were:
1. Very well organized company and structured. The workers and Mickey showed up to the house each day during the week and they arrived on time and on the little times that they didn’t show up due to things such as deliveries etc.…  they always gave us notice ahead of time which was important. 
2. All the communication between the office (Mae), Mickey and the workers were excellent. They didn't make any mistakes and were able to do everything in good and professional manner. We expected to have some errors and delays but I we were just lucky and we didn’t have any. 
3. Price wise - They were a bit more expensive than the other bids we received but the effort and care they put into our project was well worth it. Sometimes you just have to go with your instinct and choosing with them was one of the best decisions we made.

We got in touch with American home improvement about doing several things at our house. We wanted to have them paint the house, replace the windows with a double sided glass and add 2 patio doors that will give us a bigger opening space from the house to the back yard and to rebuilt the kitchen. While we worked on the kitchen with Isaac and his people, we decided to do additional things at the house that we thought it will be a good idea to do them while we do the kitchen project as well. Many thanks to American Home Improvement and mainly Mark and the actual people that were involved in our remodeling, for the excellent remodeling job that they did at our house. The remodeling project included the full remodeling of our house and it included the kitchen. Bathrooms, back yard, front yard, bedrooms and hallways. The work changed completely the house and we love it very much! Mark and his crew did such a professional work and each part of it was done with extra care and attention. During the work and even after, Mark was there for us to answer any of our questions or concerns, meeting us at various vendors and helped us selecting and choosing all the materials, appliances and paint. He used his skills and experience to advise us on all the many available options for many issues that raised during the work! We would refer American Home Improvement to anyone looking to convert their house space into something stunning!

Shlomo did a wonderful job when we hired him and his people to renovate our house. We hired him to execute our designed plans that we did with another design firm. The design plans were to remodel our kitchen, bedrooms, bathrooms, laundry room and living room on top of the dining room area as well. Shlomo at American Home Improvement and their several subcontractors that were hired for our remodeling in order to do the electricity, plumbing and custom kitchen cabinets, were able to bring the design to life with an amazing skills and special attention to all the small details which made this remodeling project a huge success and very beautiful. During the work, we noticed very clear how the working crew and the subcontractors were easygoing and skilled with several modifications that came up due to unknown problems that arises during the work and all of them were communicating with us when they happen. We look forward to working with them again in the future.

We were having Shlomo working at our house for the remodeling project that we needed to do for a while now. He met and sat with us several times of different days planning and describing their process and services. Our remodeling project was to do a new kitchen, master bathroom, master bedroom walk-in closet and replacing the old HVAC system with new one. Shlomo and Ben managed our project together and they started with measuring the existing areas of the house which allow them to come up with a design a week after. Each detail of the project was analyzed and discussed to mainly cover the cost and time frame for each task such as: appliances, countertops, cabinet style and colors etc. and the time frame that required for installing the new HVAC system from their sub-contractor. While close to half of the house was under work, American home improvement took every protection they could to cover the rest of the house from the dust and debris so we can live at the house for the time been and they made us a temporary kitchen. Each detail and part of the remodeling was supervised by both of them. The working team were very professional and skilled, from the electrician, the plumber, tile man and the painter. They all worked flawlessly together and involved us with each step of the work. Each one of them took pride in his own trade which ended in a beautiful kitchen and bathrooms that we enjoy just by looking at them. American home improvement finished our remodeling project on time and a little bit below our agreed budget and we look forward to hire them again. We highly recommend American home improvement to anyone considering a remodel.

We recently worked with Shlomo to paint my house inside and out. I purchased this house recently and the house needed to get a fresh look and makeover. Shlomo came by the house several times in order to define each space at the house for any color combination and texture in the common areas. The color combinations and textures, were so impressive and beautiful that the samples of them could prove that immediately. From all the samples that she was able to do with her painters, it was super easy to imagine how it will look like and the process was very easy. In the outside of the house, her color combinations made the same effect and this was the killer point that caused me to hire her and the team of painters from American home improvement. One of the main problems that I had, was all the furniture and items that I had at the house. Shlomo was able to solve that immediately by assigning 3 people that came to the house prior to the painters and they moved all the furniture and cover them so it will be ready for the painters to do the actual paint. The whole work went smoothly and without any problem which made me very happy and proud at myself that I hired the right company for the job. I felt that Shlomo really understood my style and she did all she could to make this on the easiest way and with completely perfection. She really listened to what I was looking for and saved me a lot of time and stress. If I wasn’t hired Shlomo or contact American home improvement, I'm sure I would still be not able to find any other paint company that could make my house this way.

We hired Daniel from American home improvement to paint the exterior of our home after using another painting company painted the interior of our home, which we were not satisfied with. During our meetings with Daniel and with his senior painter, we felt that he was honest, professional and really easy to communicate with. Daniel showed us his past homes he'd done in the past, which were amazing, but he was also open to our new ideas (that we saw or got from other places and magazines). When you are getting bids for exterior painting, you want people who are open to jobs that are creative and maybe a little more time consuming, but stunning when completed. That is exactly how Daniel is; he's allows you the time to walk the property and visualize what it could look like. He listens to you and actually paints things the way you want. Besides having a wealth of experience and knowledge, he is considerate of how a person feels about their home. He recognizes that to the buyer of services, the outcome of the services mean something to the homeowners. That's a very rare thing to find. He gave us a great quote and an excellent timeframe, and he stuck to it; even when he pointed out to us that we might consider a darker shade around our windows (that he had already painted!). In the end, we loved the paint colors and the way he made our house the most beautiful on the block. He was so easy to work with, he kept his word on everything we agreed on, and he showed up every day, on time!! His professionalism is unparalleled as far as I'm concerned. My neighbors noticed too; they had Daniel paint their houses as well! I am more than happy to recommend Daniel's work to anyone who is interested in having their home or business done. He is awesome!

We just finished our kitchen remodeling project and we have to write here that American home improvement did a great job and they beat our anticipations! While we were seating and talking about the technical aspects of the remodeling, David (our project manager) told us that the project will take anytime between 1.5 moths to 2 months at most and during that time, the workers and the sub-contractors will work on a daily basis making sure that everything will be done. Our expectations regarding the remodeling was that it will pass that time because they had to do so much and we thought that this time will not be enough. In fact, the workers did came each day to the house and they arrived on time while working very hard. The remodeling was completed in exactly a month and 5 days! We still cannot believe how they could finish it in such period of time, and in a great results. This great experience insured them that we will hire them again in the future for any additional work that we might do and we will never hire someone else other than American home improvement because they are skilled, professional and they do care about the satisfaction of their customers while focusing on what the client want before offering anything. We do recommend them to whoever needs any remodeling for their house or office.

My mom asked me to help her find a contractor to remodel her bathroom & after seeing at least 5 contractors I decided to go with American home improvement. For one, they were the only company who I felt that was sincere to my moms needs & my gut feeling was right. My mom did not have any unpleasant experience throughout the whole ordeal. The workers were great & respectful & did a great job. Most of all she loves her new bathroom. She's considering on doing her kitchen sometime soon & she will definitely use them again.

Shlomo was the American home improvement project manager for the recent kitchen and bathroom renovation that we recently did and his team of skilled and hardworking did a wonderful job. We greatly recommend American home improvement and mainly Mike, The working crew and the office staff that was involved in our project and we will hire them again for any additional remodeling project in our house. Shlomo was the project manager on both remodeling projects (kitchen and bathroom), did a perfect designing job for the kitchen space by using most of the existing space with features that we needed and wanted for a while now. From start to end, the extra attention that Shlomo put to all the details of both projects was more than what we were looking for. He always gave wonderful ideas and suggestions and he made sure that we are happy with all the decisions about both renovations. We love both projects very much! The kitchen and the bathroom got a completely brand new look and they are very functional for our needs. It makes us very happy each time any of us walk into any of them!

American home improvement and Daniel, did a great job by remodeling our bathroom. The group of workers came to our house every morning, on time and stayed till they were able to finish the work scheduled for that day. They completed what Daniel planned for them to do for that day and then they came back the following morning to continue the work under the supervision of Daniel. All the people that were involved in our project, were hardworking people and they were always on top of things even when issues came up – they were able to solve them while keeping the budget. The bathroom remodeling project was finished on the time frame that Daniel gave us before we hired him. 
We met and talked to Daniel few times before we made our final decision and that was because we wanted to be sure that we got the best deal and that they will be able to finish the work without any problem. Daniel was very nice to us and he was very easy person to work with. He explained us everything that was belong to the project and he was very pleasant man to talk to. We are very happy with Tibi home remodeling and if we ever decide on doing another remodeling project we would definitely hire them again.

After four estimates I decided to hire American home improvement to do my kitchen remodeling. Isaac from American home improvement, came over to our house for the first scheduled meeting that we arranged with the office and he was very experienced with the process of the kitchen remodeling and he was able to answer each one of the questions we had. For the second meeting, He showed up and he brought a 3D design of how the new kitchen will look like which it was exactly the way we wanted our kitchen to look like after the remodeling project will be over. Isaac was also great when it came to the estimate because he gave us a realistic quote for the work and during the work, it was so easy to communicate with him by phone, text of via the office. When it come to the way they worked, we must admit that we are satisfied with that too because they at the end of each day, they kept the kitchen space clean and they used all kind of protection materials to keep all the dust and debris separate from the rest of the living spaces of the house during the whole construction so the house won’t get messy and dirty. We didn’t have to keep informing them about it and that showed us how they really care about us. Very reliable company, we will definitely use them again.

American home improvement is definitely a top quality landscape and hardscape Construction Company and I highly recommend them for everyone that is interesting in a high quality & qualified landscape work. We met Daniel for the first time last year after we purchased our first house in LA area. We were impressed by his amount of understanding, expertise and sense of concept. He understood right away what we wanted to have and he was able to gather a great design draft of the front and back yard of the house including a detailed estimate. Due to limits in our overall budget, we ended up doing our back-yard first. Daniel’s team worked at the house from the beginning as promised and they completed the work on the projected achievement time. The crew appeared each day at the house and worked tough in order to keep the work as scheduled. The crew was managed by Carlos who is a professional foreman, pretty detail motivated person and responsive to our comments. We were so happy by the work they did, that a year after we hired Daniel to do the front yard. Also this time the work that they did was excellent. Daniel and his team truly converted our house and improved the value of our house. We recently moved to a bigger house and we decided to rent the other house that American home improvement had remodel the landscaping for. When we purchased the house, the front and back yard was remodeled by another contractor (that was done by the previous owner) and that work was too bad and horrible. The backyard concrete was so bad, that we had to remove all the concrete and pour new one. We called Daniel as we decided to redo this whole backyard. We knew that we can trust on Daniel’s opinion on how to fix all the problems. We appreciate the quality of work of Daniel and his team at American home improvement. We look forward to have Daniel do the front yard in in new house too and we will hire him for any future remodeling projects. We highly recommend Daniel and American home improvement for all of your landscape needs.

We hired American home improvement to remodel and upgrade all 3 bathrooms and 4 bedrooms at our house. The remodeling included paint with new colors and texture, the replacement of all the windows with new ones and we added few benches in the shower areas. After that, we replaced all the vanities and added in-wall storage cabinets including all the crown molding around. On top of that, they painted all the bedrooms at the house and tear down all the wall paper around the house. New light fixtures were installed in the family room and living room. The house looks very good and beautiful! American home improvement did everything they promised and even few more things that were added in the middle of the work. I will hire them again in the future for my next remodeling project. Thank you American home improvement!

It’s been a while since I wanted to remodel my house and mainly my kitchen. This is the second time I have used American home improvement for a remodeling at my house and as I was very happy in the first remodeling, this time was even better and I’m happier with the new kitchen. I hired Daniel at American home improvement on two complete bathrooms remodeling project including the kitchen at my house and I was very happy with how it went and mainly came out! I highly recommend American home improvement and I will for sure hire them again in the future!

Working with AHI was such a great experience! They were skilled, trustworthy and professional. They offered different options and ideas for our kitchen remodeling project.  They worked within our budget and we are very pleased with the result!

American home improvement planned and designed our outdoor living space and executed it after we approved all the changed and modifications so it will fit exactly to what we wanted to have. We are proud that we selected this company from all the rest and because of our great experience, we highly recommend American home improvement and Isaac including all the office staff that was involved in our house project.

When my wife & I purchased our home, we have probably met at least 5 contractors to bid on our major remodeling because our new house needed a lot of work. After the results of the final remodeling project that we got from American home improvement, we can write here that we couldn’t have asked for anything better starting with a skilled team or people or a better finished bathroom and Kitchen remodeling project! Working with Michael and his crew at American home improvement was a great experience. All of them were honest, skilled and professional. American home improvement is for sure a Top Notch construction company! Daniel including the crew of workers from American home improvement recently completed a major remodeling at our house and they assisted us understand how the construction process should go, and helped us to achieve what we wanted and still stay within the budget that we had before the work while producing our new kitchen and bathrooms as we imagined for a while now. We were looking to remodel our vacation house early of this year, and we wanted to create a brand new and functional living space that provided us an open layout and flow. Our budget was pretty fixed and we needed someone that will be able to do it within that amount. Together with Michel, we were able to create a perfect solution that allowed us to open up most of the kitchen wall and generating an additional opening that finally now can allow us to move and work on both sides of our Kitchen Island. All of our family fell in love with the new space and we enjoy cooking and entertaining all of our guests and family that come over from time to time. We are very happy and satisfied that our friends were able to refer us to American home improvement and are very fascinated by their amount of experience and craftsmanship. By working and dealing with Michel, we can state clearly that he was able to take away all the stress and worries of this big change for our house and he was able to turn our kitchen into something much better and larger than we ever imagined.

This year we purchased a "fixer" on in a community near our main house. We have completed several remodeling projects over the last 20 years, all gradually more powerful and all as an owner-builder. Since this was the most challenging project, we decided to go with a company that can design and do the actual remodeling rather than hiring an architect and then searching for a bid from general contractors. We thought that we can have a bigger effect on the design and to create an efficiency by using a good team to reach the milestones together and shortening the process. Michael from American home improvement, has verified to be the perfect choice for us and he was able to start the work immediately after we closed escrow. We worked hand by hand in the initial design stage using 3D designs, floor plans and elevations drawn by Michelle presenting to us several choices and making changes on the way. After this process was completed, Michelle’s team produced for us the necessary plans and handled all the permits. 
Our contract was in two parts:
-First part ‘Design’
-Second part remodeling’ 
We were very happy and satisfied with the cost of the design, mainly because it included a promise of a good discount in case we go with American home improvement for the second part. When we decided to hire them for the second part, we were so happy with the quality and effort that American home improvement did for us that the discount was not that important no more. Michelle earned the additional benefit! This was a large project so keeping a sharp pencil has been critical in establishing costs within the budget. Michelle worked closely with us and allowed us to save the cost by making the project possible. It has been only three weeks since the remodeling was completed, but our years of experience in remodeling, we can see that our decision was well made. No struggle was wasted and there is no doubts about all the different teams of workers that worked on this remodeling.

We had a truly excellent experience with American home improvement. Our remodeling project was to take down completely the old kitchen, rebuild it and remodel our 2 bedrooms, bathrooms and living room including the laundry room. The work started on the day and time that was set during our meetings with Jason and it was done on the day and time (with few days after due to some minor delays in the delivery of some materials) and it mainly stayed on our budget. The team of Jason listened to our comments and questions and they were very responsive to the approved design plan. They were very reliable, careful, and professional people. They were easygoing people to work with and to have in our house every day. Jason was able to make this remodeling project as easy as possible even though sometimes it was hard because all the problems that were raised during the work. I highly recommend American home improvement.

Our recent experience with American home improvement and especially with Daniel was very good. We hired them to do a complete remodeling of our kitchen. Daniel was able to provide us with a great design that contained most things we wanted, custom cabinets, new flooring, granite counter tops and the relevant appliances (Ref, Dishwasher, stove and hood). Daniel and his people were able to finish the new kitchen in less than a month and the new kitchen came out the way we wanted and even more. What we mostly appreciate is that the overall price was within our budget and even though we did some changes during the work, Daniel did all he could in order to not add any hidden charges.

I never imagined that my kitchen remodeling can be completely very fast and in a fairly price! Mickey and Elad were honest the whole time, consistent, supportive and just easy people to deal with. Before hiring them, I got several estimates and they were all higher than the one I got from Mickey. Their estimate also included more things than the other contractors such as higher quality of materials and home automation features such as outlets, lightings and thermostat. As part of the remodeling, Mickey was able to give me great suggestions on what I can and should include into the design of the kitchen and into the final product. I am very satisfied with the whole thing! Mickey went with me to his local vendors where I purchased the items I needed for the kitchen (flooring, tiles, countertops, handles, back splash and more…) – I can't say enough good things about them!

I am very pleased with the work that was performed by Mickey and his team. A friend recommended me to hire American home improvement for my house remodeling after he heard about the problem I’m currently having with the contractor that I just hired for my house in which caused me several problems at the beginning of the remodeling. After I called their office, Mickey called me and came over to my house the next day, checked and reviewed the work that was done and what still need to be completed while focusing on several problems that were caused by the previous one.  Few days later, he came back once again and presented to me his complete and fairly priced estimate on the entire work that still needed to be done in order to finish it. After our lawyer took care of the other contractor, I went ahead and hired Mickey to step in and finish the work. Mickey started to work few days after and his team came over to the house and started the work. Mickey came over the house each day to supervise the workers and to make sure that everything is going according to the plan while oversee the workers. He even did some of the work himself and the work was performed in a professional way, quick, polite and professional. I am very happy with the entire remodeling job of my kitchen, bathroom, entry, dining room and bathrooms and I strongly recommend them.

Our house had a big water damage emergency and we were in a search for someone that will be able to bring all the damage spaces in the house so we can move back to our home. We cannot write enough words about how happy are we with our kitchen remodeling that was done by American home improvement and managed by Daniel and his team of workers. In addition to that, the sub-contractors and vendors were also professional, experts, knowledgeable and honest in their tasks. The remodeling was finished on time and within our budget. More than all the above, Daniel didn’t try to either pressure us to sign any contract or to push us to add more items that we don’t need.

Our remodeling project started with the wrong company that we hired for our second story addition and a complete first floor remodel on our 1100 sq./ft. house. As our search kept going, we came across American home improvement and when we met with them at the house, we spoke to Daniel and told him what we want and if it can be done. While Daniel and his team did their plans and suggestions, we did more and more research about them because we wanted to be sure that our house will be completed. After all of our additional meetings with Daniel, We decided that we will hire them and we went forward with our remodeling project. Daniel and his teams of skilled people rebuilt our house in a better way than it should have been done from the beginning. He was able to combine his skills and vision in order to deliver outstanding product. The house came out much more beyond our expectations. Now that the house is complete and we already moved to the house, we can mention that our house is the evidence that they know how to take any remodeling project and to complete it while making the clients happy and without any stress. American home improvement price was very reasonable for the work that they did on our home. My husband & I hired American home improvement back in 2014 and we were pleased with the results of the work that they did at our previous house. Our house is now what we really knew it could be. Thank you Sam & your wonderful team for this great remodeling at our house.  We thank Sam & everyone at American home improvement! We give Ziv and David (from American home improvement) a A+ rating for the remodeling project that they did for us.
 The remodeling project involved the kitchen which includes:

 In addition to the kitchen, they did other few projects in other parts of the house like:

We adore the completed remodeling every day since it was completed a month ago. We found American home improvement on the internet and we asked them to meet with us about in regards to the kitchen.
