Since we don't use the bathtub, we opted to have more open space beside a larger shower enclosure, and no bathtub. Horizon would also install the toilet, sinks and plumbing fixtures that we furnished for the job; mount new mirrors over the vanity, install new lighting, and paint the walls.

My wife and I didn't have firm ideas on the decor, so the consultation from Horizon was very helpful. We did a session at the building materials showroom together. Once we settled on the color scheme and materials, and the fixtures that we needed to furnish to them for installation, the demolition work began and was finished very quickly and cleanly. Horizon did almost all of the work during the daytime when my wife and I were both at work. They took good care of our house and securely locked it up at the end of their day when they left.

The floor and shower tile work was perfect, and the custom glass (nothing fancy, just clear but it's just what we wanted) was installed on time, and still looks great. Part-way along Horizon suggested we consider a unique tile backsplash around the vanity, using the same accent tiles that are in the floor and the shower. They gave us a special price and although we hadn't wanted to add to our budget, we took their offer. It's a really pretty blue aqua glass tile that is the key element to the whole decoration scheme. The look we got is a bit unique, and breaks from the cookie-cutter conservative approach of the original homebuilder. Very nice and more than worth the money. If we ever sell the home, we'll point out the very custom look of the vanity.

Horizon got the building inspections and everything got approved straight off. Once the painting was done there were just a few finishing touches to get, but Horizon finished ahead of the project schedule, which is nice if your master bathroom opens onto your master bedroom and you're actually trying to live there, as we were! My son was so glad that we didn't have to share his bathroom any longer. But the bottleneck was worth it when work was complete.

Incidentally, for the new toilet, which we picked up at Costco (remember, tight budget), we bought the AMDM IntelliSeat, an electronic toilet seat (if you don't know what it is, just Google it...once you have it, you can't go back) to replace the standard seat. Although Horizon didn't seem to have experience with that product, they installed it perfectly and we love it.

About six months after the project was completed and we'd paid our final check to Horizon, the motion-sensing light switch they'd installed in the bathroom began malfunctioning. It got to be too annoying so I gave Horizon a call to see if they'd fix it for us. They reminded me that they made a full warranty on all their work, and scheduled someone to come out and work on the switch. Their man came to our house and replaced the faulty switch with a new one, which now works perfectly.

We love our bathroom and are so satisfied with Horizon's work. They are friendly professionals who follow up, deal with issues and problems when they occur, finish ahead of schedule, and back up their work.

This project included total demo and reconstruction of 3 bathrooms. It included converting the master bath from a Roman tub to a walk-in shower with travertine to the top of all walls which had cathedral ceilings and a triangular window. and replacing toilets, vanities, sinks, and all fixtures. In the guest bath, the tub was replaced with a new tub and travertine on the walls. The sink, vanity and toilet were also replaced, adding an enclosure using 3/8 inch sliding doors. In the downstairs shower, old ceramic tile was removed and replaced with travertine. The toilet, vanity, and sink were also replaced. The floors in all bathrooms were removed and replaced with travertine.
 
In late September 2012, after getting an estimate from another company for our planned remodel of 2 bathrooms, a large master bath and a smaller downstairs bath, we made an appointment with Horizon Construction and Remodeling for an estimate. We had previously read reviews here on Angie’s List.
Mark arrived at the designated time, discussed with us our plans, then took measurements of the bathrooms. He also made suggestions regarding the project. He suggested that we meet with him at MSI to look at a variety of materials so he could more accurately provide an estimate.
After deciding to have Horizon do the project, we made an appointment with Mark to go over the contract, scope of work, and the payment schedule. It was determined that work could begin on October 3 but since demolition could only begin midday, We decided that early morning the following day would be best.
The demolition crew arrived as scheduled and the project was started. Demolition of the 2 bathrooms was completed in 2 days and work began on the remodel construction. Each segment of the project went smoothly. In the meantime, we went with Mark to select a marble slab for the countertops. We also met with the cabinet maker regarding the custom vanities and color of the stain.
Work progressed smoothly and ahead of schedule. Along the way, we made several changes. Enna was very helpful in accomplishing those changes and doing the paperwork involved. She is an invaluable asset to the company.
When the original project was well on its way to completion, we decided to go ahead and do the third bathroom since we had enough marble left from the slab to do the countertop. Also, the vanity in the upstairs guest bath was the same size as the downstairs bath which made the custom construction easier and more efficient.
Mark was here on a regular basis to check on progress, answer questions, and listen to our concerns. In some cases, he had noticed things that needed correction before we even brought them up.
Any remodel project, and especially one of this magnitude, is stressful. I know of several cases where projects lasted much longer than anticipated but that was not the case here. The projected completion date was January 10, 2013, however, work was completed December 15, 2012, which made our Holiday Season more enjoyable than it might have otherwise been! The master bath, which was converted from a Roman tub to a walk-in shower is amazing and the other two bathrooms are elegant as well.
Horizon Construction and Remodeling is dependable and you can expect them to do what they agreed to do. The quality of their work is good and everyone we encountered was responsible for their part of the job. My only admonition to you is that you make sure the scope of work that you sign off on includes all the things you discussed and thought would be there.
If you have a project in mind, call Horizon Remodeling and Construction and give them an opportunity to discuss it with you before you make a final decision. We are pleased with how our bathrooms came out and would not hesitate to call Horizon for another project

Completely restructured our fireplace, hard wood floor, added new railing, and installed surround sound
Remove popcorn. Install 4 skylights & 4 solar tubes. Install bamboo flooring & carpet. Install over 35 recessed lights & art lighting. Create a magnificent bar. Remove non-structural beams. Sand, prime, paint all doors & cupboards. Replace all molding. Remove all wallpaper & paint. Install kayak & bike racks.
They are incredible, I would give them the highest rating possible without a shadow of a doubt. They are professional and do great work every time we have had them out. Their communication is great and they are all perfectionists. I would recommend them to anyone in the future. I have never had a better experience. Mark has great vision for remodeling and always holds his work to a higher standard
Horizon Construction was outstanding to work with from beginning to end. Mark Besnos is a visionary who does exceptional work. Mark and Enna (owners) were in constant communication with continual supervision to ensure quality results.They transformed a tired 1970's condo into a beautiful living environment. We will use this professional contractor again in our future remodel.

It was a pleasure working with Mark and Enna and all of their crew members. Mark and Enna went out of their way to find just the right fixtures and French doors that  I envisioned for my new master bedroom. I am especially happy with the double doors that were hung on my new closet. I was very pleased with how much attention was given to the finest details and how quickly they were able to complete the construction.

We enjoyed working with Mark and Enna to remodel and update our master bathroom. Mark was especially helpful during the planning phase when he listened patiently to our endless questions and provided useful information and suggestions that helped us reach decisions about project materials and stylistic choices. After work began, Mark and Enna continued to be very responsive to us regarding scheduling aspects of the work and finalizing decisions about the details. Throughout the process, they stressed that the goal was to create a master bathroom that we would really enjoy, even if that meant occasionally changing our minds about details or adding new work at times. This was our first major renovation project, and we feel that Mark, Enna and their team did a great job guiding us through it and creating a great new room to enhance our home.

Our kitchen & Den was recently remodeled and everyone we dealt with @ SOD Home Group was nice, professional, and performed quality work. 
The entire staff was committed to ensuring that the experience met our expectations. Whenever we had a question or concern on anything they addressed it immediately. We would highly recommend SOD Home Group for your renovations.

From start to finish, SOD Home Group was phenomenal to work with, and they went above and beyond in designing and building the addition of our dreams. Everyone we worked with (our designers, our carpenter, production supervisor, office staff) were all so friendly, competent and professional. It was as painless an experience as possible, given that we remodeled our whole house while living in it.
They really pulled that off !

They did an excellent job! We are very satisfied with the price, quality, and professional installation. They remodeled the kitchen in a timeframe that they promised. I’m looking forward to starting the bathroom remodeling project in a few months. Everything in our kitchen matches the theme we were going for.
I would recommend them to anyone needing to update their kitchen!

We recently decided to sell our home and needed some work done quickly ( kitchen, bathroom and master bedroom). I contacted SOD Home Group and as expected, they made it happen. We had the teams out within a week. And, most importantly, the work was still at the same high caliber as it always is. They finished everything in 3 weeks. I will certainly use them again as I know they do quality job. We love our home so much that we feel bad to sell it now.

I am thoroughly pleased with SOD HOME GROP From design creation to the project manager I can not praise them enough for their professionalism and attention to detail. Once we agreed on the initial aspects of the job, work began. Our project manager was open to our ideas, provided many thoughts of his own, and made time on multiple occasions to go over selection of materials and to review the design. 
I tell EVERYONE I know how consistently fantastic this company is. Our room addition looks better than we ever imagined it could be!

We were looking for a  local reputable remodeling company to renovate our entire home. Thankfully, we came across SOD HOME GROUP Company, who proven to be an expert in home remodeling and interior designing. They did a fantastic job and gave our home a stylish and sophisticated look. We had a great experience with this company. Highly recommended! Charles Martin

They just finished to renovate our guest house and backyard  for us and it turned out great. Extremely professional. From the very beginning, he provided a line by line estimate so that there was never any confusion about what needed to be done. We never had to worry that he was going come back to us and ask for more money. Communication was excellent. I felt confident that I could reach them by phone or text at any time. When unexpected issues arose, they were quick to do everything they could to see that it was taken care of in a timely manner. Would absolutely recommend and will use again in the future.

This company is amazing. Their Crews showed up on time fully equipped and did an amazing job restoring everything. After the demolition and the removal of the our guest house they set the equipment up in a very clean and workable set up. They are very knowledgeable and very educational. They took the time to educate my wife and myself about every step and how every step was going to happen and the goals that had to be met before each step could move on. When they left the house each day it look they had never even been here. They were so meticulous with their clean up, it was amazing. I would recommend them highly to everybody!

Active participation, attention to detail and a relentless pursuit of both quality and timely project execution are just some of the attributes this team exemplifies! I have had the privilege of being awarded several projects over the years and have thoroughly enjoyed working with SOD Home Group Team! I look forward to even more successful projects with these professionals and your home could be their next masterpiece! Thanks a lot!

The renovations of our three bathrooms, kitchen and Guest House went great and the transformations were amazing! I HIGHLY recommend Christian ! He is timely, fair priced, easy to work with, meticulous and does great work. Nowadays , it's hard to trust someone in your house. I have to say he earned our trust even enough that we left him with a key to our house while we went on a vacation and came home to our beautiful home! We are very pleased!

Oren and his team were amazing and I could not give them a higher recommendation!! We had an attic project that involved a bathroom and bedroom, and creating a new room in an old, very tight space. Oren provided us a response via email, saw the space and provided an estimate within 2 days, then started the project and completed it within another 3-4 weeks! His work is beautiful, his estimate was right in the middle and far less than we were expecting (and he stayed right on budget!) and his team was extremely professional, timely and responsive to our questions. Could not say more good things about SOD HOME GROUP. This is exactly what we wanted!!

Oren is very professional and quick to get a hold with when you need things done. I work with him to fix some issue with my condo when i was putting it on the market. And still working with him on the house I am about to buy with the inspection issues. He gives very reasonable prices to fix the problem.

Our Garage conversion designer, was amazing. The only agenda was that we create spaces that fit us and our lifestyle, and that we be thrilled with the outcome. They never pushed us and always listened to us and responded to what we wanted. Honestly, he is the consummate designer and professional. SOD HOME GROUP gets a standing ovation.

Don't look anywhere else. To say that my job didn't go exactly according to plan would be an understatement and Mario and his entire team were pros from start to finish. Our job was a demo of our old guest house and rebuilding, designing and installing a beautiful new guest house under the watchful eye of Mario and the team. The consistent communication from Mario was also a huge plus as the home is a complete remodel and I'm rarely on site. Finally, remember that you get what you pay for; there may be cheaper contractors out there, but there aren't any better - take that to heart.

I can't thank SOD Home group enough. They were organized from the onset. Their presentation was better than anyone else that my family and I looked requested bids from. They were great through every step of the process. From demolition, to installing/building everything, to having it all completed. I enjoyed the process of it all. Awesome.

Oren from SOD Home Group , led our house renovation project over a period of five weeks.  Oren and his team were responsive, professional and accommodating of our requirements - from the initial estimate meeting up to the finish of the project. We even added items to the original scope, along the way, and they were still able to complete on time and on budget.  
As the project came to an end, we had to do a detailed quality check ourselves, but once we pointed out any outstanding finishes, they finished the job to perfection. We would definitely work with Oren and team again for any future renovation needs.

This started out as a project to make my mother in laws home ADA compliant, and we ended up updating the entire home. It seemed logical after discussions with Mario, and so we moved forward. The project was completed very quickly due to our timeline and the results are phenomenal! Working with contractor Mario was a pleasure. He is honest and hard-working and is a complete contrast to my previous experiences. Will use them for all my future projects.

After interviewing several companies for the room addition project, we hired SOD Home Group. We were very impressed with the vision, professionalism, and ideas from our sales representative Mario . We valued all the detailed and self-explanatory estimates and budget, including the schedule that was presented to us before we signed the contract. When the remodeling project started, we were updated daily via e-mails and additional visits by Mario. The people who worked at the house on the project were respectful of our house and they always cleaned at the end of each day. They also guided us with all the interior design with the selection of light fixtures, floor tiles, and paint color/style choices. At the end of the remodeling project, it addressed any detail that we needed additional attention on.
Our room addition turned out to be a success and it’s our favorite room in my home :)

Oren is fantastic! His team seriously saved my butt. I hired them, to remodel my kitchen and 3 bathrooms, and am so very glad that I did. They worked very hard to deliver on a timeline that was, I'm sure, terrible- but they really came through for me. He's gone out of his way to make a difficult situation less stressful. Oren is extremely professional and I would highly recommend him. He's clearly very knowledgeable, and has been very communicative. Seriously can't thank him enough for bailing me out of this mess

We had needed to replace our bathroom. We set up a meeting with SOD Home Group team. Oren was extremely professional. He explained the process and our choices and was very pleasant and professional. The project was handled very professionally - the workers were punctual and cleaned up after themselves daily. The project was completed on time for exactly what Oren had quoted in the estimate. He was easy to get in touch with if we had questions. The Bathroom looks amazing. This company stands by its warranty and its word. We were thrilled with the service we received them and would highly recommend this company.

Today, I met the designer who’ll be my right hand planning our kitchen and 2 bathrooms renovation. The designer was very informative and guided me in choosing my desired design and suggested us to think about how we’ll be preparing meals, and consider schedule before setting a date for work to begin. I am very excited for the results! Absolutely excellent customer service!

What a fresh breath of air speaking to Mario. His honesty and non sales approach to helping me understand the process
After thinking about an ADU for such a long time we finally started looking into it the last 5 months. We spoke to a lot of contractors and really felt comfortable with the knowledge and value this company had. We could not be happier with the result highly recommend!!!

We had a major large bath remodel....Every pat of the job from the virtual design to punch out was handled without any issues.  I was most impressed  how they did not nickel and dime me for minor changes. .  Special thanks to Mario who obviously have renovated hundreds of baths
Full bath basement project finished on budget. The crew was Very punctual, good quality work and cleaned up every evening when finished. Project turned out good and I would recommend

Absolutely the best ADU contractor ( well
At least we think they are ) . They did a spectacular job creating a 900 sqft 2bed, 1.5bath dwelling unit on my house earlier in 2021. From designing the floorplans to handling the paperwork and picking the right materials to the actual construction, I was beyond pleased with their knowledge and expertise at each step. The finished product superseded our expectations. I feel fully confident in giving a high recommendation for this company for your ADU project. You Rock !!

SOD Home Group went above and beyond and delivered better than what I could have imagined. They stand by their work and I will be working with them on my future projects. Thank you for getting our room addition done in time for the holidays.

SOD Home Group  is definitely one of the premier renovation contractors in CA. These guys aren't your typical contractors who show up in an old truck, 2 hours late, and do the job half-ass. They're pros. Seriously. Down to their branding, customer service and quality of work. You get what you pay for and SHG is well worth your money if you want the job done right.

We were quite pleased with SOD Home Group - from the initial consultation, changes made based on budget and preference, help with picking colors, patterns and materials. Everyone involved was pleasant and patient with us. 
The finished work looks great, and the few items that have required 'tweaks' post project have been handled quickly and cheerfully.
Will use them again, I'm sure!

It was a pleasure working with Oren and his crew, we would definitely call them again. They were in touch with us almost everyday letting us know what was going on and if we had any questions. All of the crews that came were professional, flexible and thorough, any issues were promptly taken care of without fuss. We ended up spending more than we had anticipated mainly because of Oren’s enthusiasm and the designs they prepared for us were outstanding, it was hard to say no. The finished work is beautiful, we are very happy!

as a woman, I appreciate how respectful Oren was when providing me with an estimate, going over the contract, and discussing the end results. Although I knew nothing about room addition, he did not make me feel dumb regardless of how many questions I had or explanations I required. He was thorough and transparent. He complied with my requests and made sure I was 100% comfortable with moving forward. I was impressed how quick and efficiently the team worked. After 10 bids and lots of reference checking, they were among the best in pricing, customer service, and job completion.

SOD Home Group completed a major remodel and home addition project for us.  We interviewed a few other contractors, but SOD stood out because of their fair pricing, confidence and professionalism.  We interviewed two other home owners who had used SOD in the past and they had great things to say about Oren and his group.  They transformed our ageing 1600 sq.ft. home into an amazing 2900 sq. ft. that is absolutely breathtaking.  Since this was our dream home being built, we were very involved in selecting materials for the project and the SOD team was very accommodating. They also worked well with other contractors like HVAC, fire sprinkler and sidewalk.   They executed the job to perfection while coordinating with the city for inspections. They did a great job with everything from the laying of the new foundation, framing, electrical, plumbing.  The best part was that they did an excellent job of finishing including flooring, painting, etc.  They were very responsive to fixing minor touch-ups even after we had moved in.  I would whole heartedly recommend SOD.
SOD Home Group folks worked on our bedroom remodel. The work was done on time and the quality was great.

I wanted to do a tech update and remodel to my home in Saratoga. The home was outdated for my style. The SOD Home Group team could handle everything. I had a designer that I wanted to use, but they didn’t pan out and SOD Home Group hooked me up with another designer who did an amazing job. They worked together well, so my experience was very easy. Oren kept me up to date as far as they progress. His experience as a General Contractor made me feel at ease. He really knows what he’s doing. We opened the space up and did a lot of updates, including the pool, which needed to be updated and repaired. The result is exactly what I wanted, and I didn’t have to stay out of my home longer than estimated which I was nervous about. Everything turned out great! Worth every penny!

We were considering remodeling our entire house for several years now and we just never had the money to. When we could finally afford it, we were so spooked about hiring a contractor. Every story we heard was so terrifying! Everyone we knew remodeled got ripped off, the contractor did a horrible job and had to redo the project, or simply took their money and never showed up. We went on a couple of different routes to deeply search and find the right contractor for our project. After meeting a couple of them, we signed a contract with SOD Home Group. They had great appearance online and when we asked if they can take us to a few of their completed and ongoing projects, Oren did not hesitate! Oren immediately agreed. We remodeled our kitchen, bathrooms, living room, dining room, backyard, front yard, and added a new laundry room. Oren’s crew was so respectful, clean, and always on time. Living in your home through construction can be a little bothersome and disturbing. Not to mention that you have no privacy but SOD Home Group crew gave us as much privacy as possible and also disturbed me as little as possible since we work from home (since this COVID started). The quality and craftsmanship they provided is just superb! If you are looking for an honest, and trustworthy contractor definitely call SOD home Group! Oren and the team made what we thought would be a horrible experience into a marvelous, easy-going! we’ll certainly be contacting them down the road for all my remodeling projects.

I took 5 estimates for our remodeling project that included the garage, kitchen, 2 bathrooms. SOD Home Group was by far the fairest bid and the most knowledgeable contractor. Oren was my project manager. Unlike one of the other contractors who completely disregarded my ideas, Oren listened to my ideas and helped me realize them. The project ran into some delays as Oren worked to clear through permitting challenges. Thank goodness that Oren was so diligent in resolving those challenges. Oren and I were in constant contact from the beginning of the year until mid-July, when the job was completed (and I mean constant communication, daily). The consistent communication was also very appreciated. At the end of the day, I felt I could trust Oren, and that is a truly rare thing. If you need help with any remodeling project, give these guys a call — they are good.

The best way I can explain my experience with this company is that everything was done marvelously. One thing Oren promised us from day one is that we will get custom work. That’s exactly what we received - custom remodeling in all matters of the project. Oren helped us hire a custom cabinet maker. They did custom kitchen cabinets, linen closets and our bathroom vanities. Next we needed custom doors and windows since our house was so old and we had to fit all sizes, so once again Oren helped us hire a custom door and window maker. Since we have a large space and the flooring runs through pretty much both top and bottom level and we didn’t want to rip out the old woods, we had to hire someone to make us new custom flooring to match the old one that they had put in close to 90 years ago. We also ended up redoing all of our electric lines, plumbing lines, drain lines and gas lines. Oren helped us hire a plaster specialist who could duplicate the plaster texture that they had done many years ago. He also could help us find the company to duplicate the old plaster base and ceiling molding. Because this was such an old house and large house, we had to get the right contractor to do custom remodeling work. Oren could find us all the local specialists who work in older homes and can duplicate the quality and craftsmanship of what they had used earlier on. We had a lot of woodwork which needed to be customized, not just installation, but also custom making the actual moldings from scratch. One of the best things about Oren was that he had the answers to a lot of our questions. But what I like most about him is that he didn’t get scared of a challenge and in fact pursuited head-on. If there was something that he didn’t know, he wouldn’t just say, well that’s not my problem. He would help us find the right person or company to do that. I’m truly grateful that we could find Oren and his company to help us renovate this property. The house looks marvelous but the best thing about it is that you can’t tell that it was done now it still looks like it was built 100 years ago. What Oren could do for us was that he gave us great ideas to keep the old charm of the house but still update the house where we have a smart home and smart thermostat and the ability to control a lot of different aspects from our phones or tablets. I truly believe that we spent a premium on this renovation. But it was definitely worth it because the house looks marvelous and the property values since we have done the renovation have gone through the roof. Oren was definitely the most expensive contractor that we had interviewed but he was also the most understanding and the most caring. Also another great thing about him was that he was always accessible to us. Whether we called him, texted him or emailed him he would always get back to us immediately. I have heard of horror stories from other clients and contractors. I’m glad that this was not our experience.

I’ve been through my share of remodels and almost all the experiences took more time, more money...you know the story. And then my mother’s condo had water damage, which was uninhabitable. Despite solid insurance, the moment the tests came back positive for mold and sewage, we knew this was going to be a complete move out, demo and remodel. I had 5 bids come back and chose Oren with SOD Hoe Group. He and his team are my heroes. Open communication, direct eye contact, honest opinions, quick problem solving, and most of all, they took care of us when COVID hit and the building shut down to all contractors. Even though we had weeks left on our schedule to get the job done, I could have the Board give us 5 days so that my mother could move back in and they made it happen with no changes to the original renderings. Oren’s communication was impeccable, with immediate responses to every question and request. The craftsmanship is PERFECTION! Thank you, Oren!!!

We started our complete remodeling project by remodeling the kitchen and bathrooms and because it went much better than we expected… we remodeled all the other sections of the house (front and back yard, pool, garage and more…). Oren helped us to select all the finishing materials and fixtures that we needed for the entire remodeling, and his workers worked every day and they completed the project on time. Our huge remodeling project went so well that the house got a fresh look and feel. Oren and the rest of the team did a very professional job and we are very pleased with the results. We recommend them to anyone considering a remodeling project.

Oren and his team at SOD Home Group were beyond excellent regarding my home remodeling project. They were thorough, detailed and kept me informed regarding most of the important parts of the remodeling the entire time. I am mainly pleased with the fresh look and open space of our house which got a fresh look and wide open space. It didn’t matter to us, but there was a bit of a disconnect between the sales pitch timeline and the actual timeline for the demo and installation. I wanted quality, and that’s what I got.

SOD Home Group made our long time vision come true. Overall, we knew what we wanted when we decided to re-landscape our front and back yard, but going from head to paper to reality doesn’t always happen mainly because we wanted too much that at the end would not look good. Lucky for us, Oren, with his exceptional experience and knowledge, could make it happen. Oren’s knowledge as an arborist made it easy for us to communicate our ideas while taking advantage of his design expertise. He was creative in working with our budget, his expert crew was hardworking, conscientious, and respectful of Covid protocol, and Oren continues to follow up to make sure our garden is thriving. We could not be happier with our new front yard, and are looking forward to having SOD Home Group back for future projects.

We have been dreaming for a few years about how we will design the kitchen, what will it have and how it will serve us. We wanted it to be and look no less than perfect. We worked closely with Mr. Oren on the initial design (which after a few corrections and meetings, become the final one) and he gave us many beautiful ideas and solutions to select from and to have as part of the remodeling. At the end, we are happy, very much with his design, work, time frame to finish the remodeling job and his super happy personality. Oren is a pleasure person to work with. He always made sure that our vision of what we want… will matches what he can do and now we are in love with the new kitchen. Very high skilled company and we recommend to anyone that in case they want any beautiful remodeling job with a truly honest company and excellent customer support... they will have to contact this company.

I highly recommend Oren, SOD Home Group! He is very knowledgeable, answered all my questions (and more), very professional, and responsive. He spent over 3 hours showing me all the possibilities that can be done to my kitchen, if you know little about all the little details about remodeling your home (like I do), he will explain it to you in terms that you will completely understand and turns your ideas into this beautiful 3D design. Oren also had great ideas and recommendations on how to attain your dream home. He knows house histories, and why houses were built in a certain way! He is unlike any other contractor that will just throw out random price of how much the renovation could cost you without showing you hard proof. I’m a visual learner, so when Oren made this amazing 3D design using the exact measurement of my kitchen, it blew my mind. It even gave me a chance to actually change few things that did not quite look right with kitchen. Most importantly, he will make sure you will enjoy and have fun designing your home. Oren, you are the best!

SOD Builders was hired to remodel our house that we just purchased los Angeles area. We are very confident to recommend them because many different reasons but for the sake of this review… we’ll just mention some of them.

We are so happy with the new our and we can’t wait to hire them again in the future for a pool remodeling project. We are fully satisfied with  the beautiful work executed by SOD Builders!

We had a townhouse remodeled and it included all the upper and lower cabinets in the kitchen, master bathroom redesign and remodeled & guest bathroom downstairs with new marble counter tops,  faucets, double sinks, wall mirrors & recessed lights on top of new layer of paint and electrical work.  The whole remodeling project final costs was much less than we originally budgeted and it was finished much faster than we planned. They both kept us up to date on the progress of the work & each day they sent us pictures of the work that was performed each day. We are happy with the ideas that they came up with during the work and we would highly recommend them.  Many thanks to the whole SOD Builders crew for an excellent remodeling job.

SOD Builders gets my high score for being so skilled, honest and professional during the entire pool construction that we recently had at our house. We convert the garage into a guestroom that is 550 sq/ft in size. We hired Oren and his company at SOD Builders to do that after he was able to give us a great price on the materials and the labor. Oren at SOD Builders did a perfect work with the 4 bathrooms project at our house. We had such a wonderful experience with SOD Builders all the way from the design during the actual work  installation and final check list of our remodeling project with the team. After the work was completed, Oren stayed in touch with us in order to be sure that we were very satisfied and happy with the complete work (kitchen, 2 bathrooms and the entry of the house). Oren at SOD builders came over to our house (we got his contact information from a coworker who just hired them for a large-scale remodeling project). he measured the kitchen and bathroom and took some pictures in order to generate a great design for the spaces. the work was divided to sections:

during the work, we had no issue with any of the employees. 
they did their work and made sure to move everything before work.

We used SOD Builders for a remodeling project recently and I cannot recommend them highly enough. They did awesome work at all stages of the remodeling project, from drafting to design to the actual work. On top of that, they were very friendly and nice people to work with. My remodeling project included: New kitchen, new hardwood flooring and paint of the entire house, in addition to some minor bathroom updates. We had the pleasure working with SOD Builders and the team. Our remodeling ended up much better than what we wanted. I have hired SOD Builders on major repair and renovation project for my damaged house that got damaged after a fire damage. The customer service and attention that I got from this company and mainly from the actual people that worked at my house was outstanding and I would highly recommend them with my eyes closed to anyone that need to any remodel any house that have this type of damage. Here is with my own words of why and what they did at my house that caused me to write this review and recommendation about them: 
a.Honest & ethical: From the first time I called them till the moment the final payment was done, I noticed that all they care was to make sure to do the work on the best side and not to try and find reasons to earn more and more money. During the work itself, there were additional problems that were found and most of them were taken care of without even letting me know or to try and charge me for additional money.
b.Budget – The work was divided to 2 sections... section 1 was for the first time they arrived to my house and tried to save as much as possible things. And the second time was for the complete work that needed to be done in order to make the house as a living house. In both things, the amount that was set, was fixed and didn’t changed and more than that. On the second stage, the budget that was set didn’t raised or included any hidden charges.
c.On-time: They give realistic timeframes and realistic quotes. They may not the cheapest or fastest, but you can be sure and confident that they're costs will be reasonable and that they will complete the job without any hesitation or concern when they promise and within budget.
d.Great working skills and extremely ethical working people: The people at SOD Builders were able to provide me with excellent ideas about the new repairs. Because of the damages, I have the opportunity to redesign the kitchen mainly and the first floor of the house.
e.Great people! The company assigned to my house several people that did the actual work and they were managed and supervised by Oren. Oren was the most serious person that we dealt from the company and all he cared was to make sure that the work is being done on the most perfect side and without any problem. The rest of the people were excellent people.

We were satisfied with our previous contractor who remodeled our master bathroom but this time he wasn’t available to do it due to some family reasons and we wanted to remodel the rest of the bathrooms including the kitchen so we started to make our research and to find a good contractor. Our neighbor hired SOD Builders recently and he showed us his remodeled bathroom and it was amazing so we asked for the phone number of SOD Builders. We called them and spoke to Christin who was very nice to us, she was able to schedule the meeting with Oren and to start the work within a week and a half after. The price was fair and we hired them. The remodeling project took 8 weeks, which was within a promised time frame. They did a very good job, and the quality of all the finished products were at highest level and it looks beautiful. We truly can’t ask for more. Very Professional contractor, We will recommend and hire their service again – for sure!

In one word,  WOW!
Oren Dagan and SOD Builders has far exceeded our expectations with their outstanding customer service, design team, and quality of work. They have been so wonderful to work within our home remodeling in Westlake Village. Their team has been prompt, patient, and professional in dealing with my wife and me in our crazy time. They have team, great eye for the most up to date trends and trades yet have been very practical in dealing with our budget and the fact we have four young children under the age of ten. We had the privilege to work with Oren and the fantastic team of SOD Builders as we were building our new home in Palo Alto.  Oren, Michal, Kathy, Rose Tomy, Mario and the entire team of SOD Builders, took our fantastic house and gave the welcoming, warm feel of a family home that we can be proud of. Our family is forever grateful for all their help and will not hesitate to use them again in the future. Thank you, family!

Oren from SOD builders was hired to create our dream house. We renovated two bathrooms, added an additional bathroom & laundry room and installed hardwood floors in all the bedrooms. We hired SOD builders to create an outdoor patio living space on our home. The house that we purchased is very nice and was not maintained for a while before we purchased it. The kitchen and the two bathrooms were too old and needed to have a complete renovation. We hired SOD builders to perform a big remodeling of our home. After questioning several construction companies to repair and renew our kitchen we were very impressed with SOD builders and are glad we hired them. I was very pleased with the work and service that was provided by Oren. Our kitchen was a bit too small and uncomfortable because of a separating wall that was between the kitchen to the dining area, so we wanted to make it bigger and lighter and mostly to have the feeling of open space that will enlarge the space since we have the long windows and sliding doors by the dining area. When we hired Oren from SOD builders, we liked that we dealt directly with the owners and no unprofessional salesman who work for commission and keep trying to push in order to sign the contract now and add as many items as he could knowing that we don’t know much about construction. I fully recommend SOD builders! Oren and his team completed two remodels for our home in Tehachapi. The first remodel included two custom bathrooms in 2014. Oren's work is top-notch; you get what you pay for. Do it right the first time. We really love our new home, and we would highly recommend SOD builders and his team!

I wanted to take the time and to express my experience and appreciation of the work that was done with SOD builders. Few months ago, we decided that it was finally the time to remodel all the bathrooms at the house (3 in total). After several recommendations and good search results, we came across SOD builders and we were impressed by their online site and past projects. From what we saw and heard, we decided to call them and to get more information about what we want to do and to hopefully schedule a face to face meeting and to take it from there. To our house arrived Oren and he checked and saw what we would like to achieve and to get from the bathrooms and what is the budget that we can afford. The first meeting was very good and few days later, we got the estimate for the work and Oren asked to meet with us again in order to go over it and see what can be changed. We really love my new bathrooms and we hope to work with SOD builders in the future.

They took our $1,000 deposit and never worked on our deck or kitchen.  They were going to build our deck then remodel our kitchen for $80k.  It didn't happen.  They were to work on our deck prior to out kitchen.      It took over 1 month for them to respond to us at all after giving them our deposit check for $1k.    We kept waiting and waiting for a response, but we never received anything from Adam (our project manager).
Adam came to our house, he was a great sales person.  He convinced us that a SOD Builder is a fantastic company.  My wife had a great rapport with Adam during the initial interview/quote.  She mentioned I would travel to his home country (Hungry) for work.   He was excited and asked me questions where I went and how I liked it.  He seemed very personal and trust worthy, and I was sold.
I cut them a check for $1k on April 1,2016 for a deposit.  It was cashed on April 15th, 2016.  
Adam promised they would start immediately and he would personally be in charge of the project and be able to start the week of April 11th.  We were so exited getting a new deck and remolded kitchen.   They signed us up for Buildetrend.com.  This was a way for us to see the progress of our remodel.  I thought we were in the right hands.
We sent all the prints for the deck and permits to Adam.  The prints for the kitchen and permit were in progress.
We scheduled a time Monday April 11th, for the foeman to come get an assessment on the Demo of our deck., since Adam was the project manager, we thought Adam was going to be there too.  But to our surprise, only Damien (subcontractor) and another 2 workers were there. 
Damien asked for the drawings that we gave to Adam.  I was shocked, why didn’t Adam (Project Manager) give Damien (Sub Contractor) plans for our deck?  Our architect gave the official prints to Adam?  I don’t have a copy.  I ran scrambling thru emails looking for some type of schematic.  I finally found it after 20 mins of looking.  our Architect came by 10 mins after.  Our Architect was also expecting the Sub-Contractor to have the blue prints.  This was totally unprofessional.  There was no communication between Adam and the Sub-Contractor. 
After Damien left, we were told by SOD via Karla,  that Adam would “oversee” the project from the office.  He will never be on Site, only for emergencies.  The interview was the last time I talked to Adam or receive and email from our “Project Manager”.  This was not conveyed to us as the owners.  I wish he would have mentioned it during the quoting process.  We didn’t even get Damien’s email address.
Back to the story.  Now Damien has the plans, no work for the rest of the week. We try to contact Adam, to get pricing on the wood.  No contact from Adam from Tuesday Apriil 12- Friday April 15.  
Monday April 18th rolls around, no work has been done on the Deck, no contact from Adam for pricing.    We try to contact Adam or anyone from SOD, but nothing.  No Contact from Adam from Monday April 18th – Friday April 22. 

Monday  April 25 rolls around this is the 3rd week, NOTHING  has been done to the Deck.  NO contact at again from Adam or SOD.  Monday April 25 – Tuesday April 26th.

Tuesday night, April 26th I’m so frustrated, I email again,  thru builder trend and finally Angie’s list.  Pleading to get some answers from Adam.  All I want is our deck to be started.  
On Wednesday morning of April 27, 2016, I finally get a response from SOD, but they say   “I know that Karla and Adam are working on getting the pricing for you. They are just trying to collect all the information they need in order to give you an accurate price.”  Why didn’t they call us at all for those 3 weeks?  NO contact, ignoring our emails.
Later in the day, Oren Dagan contacts us via Buildertrend.com.  He says he wants to start the project next week, but he wanted to know:
•Do you want us to start working on the kitchen at the same time.
•Do you have the permit ready for the kitchen?Is your architect going to do that?
•Do you have the engineering (if needed) drawing for the wall removal?
•Are you ok with us starting the deck already, before the kitchen or do you want it all in once?
•Can you provide me with few days that i can send the carpenter over?
•Have you chosen your appliances, fixtures, hardware and etc for the kitchen? do you need any help or list of items needed?

WTF!! We talked to Adam about this way in the beginning during the quote.  He took lots of notes. He even itemized all these items on the agreement that we signed.   It’s like we are starting all over again! All they wanted was their deposit from us. 

We were totally frustrated.

Oren from SOD builders was our lead contractor for our complete home renovation. After the initial design that we got from the architect and speedy construction, Oren did a great job by helped us with design of floorings, bathrooms, light fixtures, countertops, marble and tile work. We know that many contractors or construction companies could built our house, but what SOD builders can offer is a passion for your home and a promise that they are equal to the task of fulfilling its promise in the absolute standard of honesty and integrity to which they clearly hold themselves.

I hired SOD builders to bring the backyard finally to life. My house is a new construction house and the lot was mainly dirt. This project was a challenging one because of the uneven space and I wanted to extend it by removing part of the hill side of the back yard.
 After spoking with an office personal from SOD builders, for the initial meeting that I had with them, I met with Oren. Oren was able to provide me with 2 designs including an estimate for each one of them in order to help me get few ideas of what I can do and mainly the cost of the extended lot.

My main concern was that during the past, I did some remodeling work and my experience with them was not good at all. Sure enough, there were some problems and issues, but Oren solved them when they arrived and without involving us too much with the solutions. SOD builders did such an excellent job and each time I hear a good word from someone that visit my house, I feel much happier about SOD builders and MAINLY Oren.

We used SOD builders, Inc. for our kitchen remodeling project. This remodeling included all the new and custom (upper and lower) cabinets with an island in the center of the kitchen that added so much beauty and functionality to the super strange kitchen layout. The quality of the wood cabinets is really great and high. Great thick wood, anti-slam doors, changeable shelves, modified doors, and even custom handles. Oren from SOD builders, Inc. installed all the counter tops that matched perfectly with the wood. The island that we did, was furnished with the under sink and wine cooler. And Last thing was the back-splash who also was installed beautifully. Oren is a remarkable contractor in the Los Angeles area. Looking how the working crew was working on the kitchen was pretty substantial. They were very accurate, detailed and cared about quality. I was surprised to see the crew cleaning the site after finishing their daily work. At the end, we had a very good experience with Oren from SOD builders, Inc. and we are very pleased with the great work and final price. I highly recommend SOD builders, Inc. construction.

Oren and his team from SOD builders were fantastic people to work and deal with for the remodeling project that they did at my house. They remodeled my kitchen, 2 bathrooms and the 2 bedrooms. In the kitchen we remodeled the whole kitchen by replacing the cabinets, counter top, back splash, lightings, sinks, appliances and all the hardware. Oren and the designer were able to design the kitchen completely on a set of 3D designs and they were able to do it as close as possible to the real thing. This design was a great feature that allow us to see how it will look in reality. The bathrooms were also designed and planned by Oren and his office. The bathrooms were demolished completely and Oren redesigned it completely by replacing the shower (in one of them) and the bath tub and shower in the other one. On top of that, He installed all the vanities, faucets, lights, outlets and floor. The bedrooms were the easy ones because all we did was the new paint, crown molding, closet and carpet. Oren made sure that the rooms will be ready first so we can live in the house while the other spaces are being remodeled. We noticed that Oren has a great attention for aesthetics, functionality and beauty, He always keeps the resale value of the house in mind just and he kept mentioning that to us in case we will thing to sell the house in the future. His communications skills added a great amount of trust and happiness and even the suggestions that he gave us in regards to the whole remodeling were a good plus. They were very patient with us during the selection process of all the materials, and even coming back multiple times when our little ones prevented us from being as efficient as we hoped. We've heard so many bad stories of contractors that either left in the middle or did a bad job that caused to redo all the work again. This was certainly not the case with SOD builders and the people there, they were efficient and even surprises happened, they did the work without any additional fees. The only increase that we had was when we decided to increase the work around the fireplace in the living room. We will recommend SOD builders to our friends and family, and we will show their work s referrals. We usually don’t give reviews, but they were worthy.

I recently had the powder room at my house completed remodeled by Oren and his workers from SOD builders. The old powder room had so many issues and it was not functional enough to our needs. It was originally done by the original builder so Oren and his team had a few challenges on their hands due to the bad existing layout. Oren was able to address all the issues with the powder room by maximize the space and installing as many cabinets as he could and I am extremely pleased with the end results. His team of workers installed new drywall, fully sanded and painted the walls and ceiling with color combination that was recommended to me by Oren at one of our meetings before I hired them, they also fixed the plumbing and replaced some of the pipes, did a complete electrical work by adding several outlets and switches and installed the vanity, toilet, and tile flooring. Oren made sure to provide me each daily with any update on the project and he made sure I was happy with every detail and stage of the powder room. He was extremely patient and understood exactly what I wanted.  I am very particular about my home and I stressed to Oren how important it was for me to have every perfect. Oren understood and reassured me that he would make sure I was happy with the results. Oren and his team exceeded my expectations which is pretty hard to do. I recommend SOD builders for anyone looking for a quality contractor to remodel their home.  I will definitely be using SOD builders for future projects in my home.

Hiring SOD builders and working with Oren was a great and smart decision to do. 
We recently did our huge kitchen transformation. The job included the removal of few walls, ceilings popcorn being removed, new plumbing, new lighting and outlets with some smart home features etc...The interview process was very intense and massive. We feel we interviewed a fairly amount of contractors (7)! We talked and met a variety of people/companies, from small to large. We called to each one and spoke to them over the phone and did a research about them making sure that they have valid license, insurance and bond. We talked to few secretaries that couldn’t say our names correctly even and made mistakes with the appointment schedules.  When we called Oren from SOD builders he (the owner) answered...huge and big advantage on the rest. Some of the contractors that visited our house for an estimate would either agree to all of our requests by saying, "absolutely or of course" yes we can knock down this wall and not worry about support.  And some of them kept telling me how they wanted to model our kitchen, not listening to our requests or ideas... Oren was a very straight to the point kind of guy and without any selling stories.  He told us we could knock down walls but be sure about any support beams that would have to stay or replaced.  The first day we talked through the design and all the financing options.  Since it was our first big project, we honestly didn’t have any idea about how much it could cost. The demolition was quick and clean. It took them only 2 days to complete this task. The working team were very nice to us and we got to know a lot about them. They made sure to use plastic covers every day and sweep up at the end of every day and made sure our house was livable. We ran into some of the beam support issues we mentioned above.  Oren came up with a great solution that caused us to redesign the kitchen look. Oren came up with a suitable layout that worked for us.  This actually changed the focal point of the kitchen and we loved the new look with this change. The project took a bit longer than we thought it would but was within the time frame that Oren promised us.  We could've had it done in less time but we wanted to take our time and to make sure that we are comfortable.  The final kitchen is really stunning. We can see that there was a lot love, care, special touch and craftsmanship into the smallest finishing details. Oren was on site almost every day.  If it wasn't him, then his foreman was.  He was equally as professional and committed as Oren was.  Oren saw every step all the way through and ensured no detail was over looked.  There was even a few details we asked for at the beginning of the project that we failed to remind him of that made its way into the final product.  We were really happy to see this. There were several of small problems and things that needed to be addressed after the project ended, but Oren was there.  He popped in to make sure all was still good.  He does this because the house needs a chance to settle in a bit.  He addressed them no problem. OVERALL EXCEPTIONAL JOB by Oren and his team at SOD builders.  We will definitely be working with him again!!!

We recently hired SOD builders for a few projects at the house. The remodeling project was including: 
-Adding a balcony Door and window from the bedroom to the patio/backyard, 
-Full complete bathroom remodeling. 
-New fireplace and mantel installation. 
-Re-tiling the entryway and the kitchen with dining area.  
 Oren and the workers definitely won our business after meeting us at the house and worked around our budget and they delivered exactly the results that we were hoping to get from them. Oren was very professional and knowledgably throughout the whole time of the remodeling and any issue that we had with anything, Oren was able correct it. He was also extremely helpful by explaining us how things would look after we had trouble visualizing few things, like the pattern of the tile. What really put them over the top in our book was that 3 weeks after… the remodeling was done. I have noticed a few small gaps in the grout on the flashing around the shower but it never really bothered me too much.  But since he called, I mentioned this to him, and he sent one of his guys over to take care of it. Oren's worker also installed a new water regulator in the shower after the water pressure was too high after using it for a month. We are pleased with everything and would recommend to friends and would use them on future projects.

We found SOD builders, after being frustrated in the past from other contractors. From the initial meeting that we had with Oren, we were impressed. We would like to express our excellent experience with the remodeling of our house that was done by SOD builders and managed by Oren. Our recently completed full home remodeling that included:

The remodeling came out great and we are honestly enjoying each part of it due to the success of it. The team was trustworthy and competent, and we could always reach Oren and his staff at the office when we needed. For these reasons, we were very comfortable putting our second project in his hands. We would not hesitate to recommend Oren for any remodel or construction project. We thank him for making our home beautiful.

From the first day I called SOD builders and met with Oren, I was impressed with their customer service very much and how they know to follow up everything. He, and his office manager Yael, and his interior designer, Rachael, guided me in all my decisions and made sure I stayed on budget and still get the most out of the needs in this remodeling without compromising any of the design elements I wanted and needed. They were professionals and very polite. I have never dealt with workers like this before and I was extremely suppressed with them. In the bottom line, the new kitchen is beyond my expectations. We finished the remodeling of the new kitchen ahead of schedule and a little bit above budget (for some additions that we wanted to have and were not included in the initial estimate.

At first, we wanted to remodel the kitchen at our house by our self, but we figured out that it will be so hard and complicated for us to even manage this type of a project so the best option was to hire a contractor instead and let him do it. This idea a great idea but the only challenge we had was that we wanted the kitchen to be done as soon as possible. We were honestly impressed by the all the photos that we saw about SOD builders past projects and we decided to give them a call and to meet with them in order to determine if they are the right for us. SOD builders estimate stood out because they were the one that reached out to us when we had all the hard and easy questions about the estimate. The kitchen space was the biggest issue because it supposed to be the main focal point in the house and the main space in our requirement in the remodeling. Oren had so many great ideas! He suggested us to tear down the wall that separating the living room from the kitchen. We loved this idea because it will give our home a big open space feeling AND connecting all rooms. At the end of the work, we were blown away by the new transformation. Oren listened to our ideas and he was able to incorporate all of them into the new design of the kitchen. I hired SOD builders for a 650 sq/ft. of living room addition. Before we hired them, we already had all the necessary plans on hand including all the secured building permits with the city. I found this fantastic construction company almost by an accident, literary driving close by, and never regretted it. I love the new kitchen and I would highly recommend Oren and SOD builders to anyone who needs high quality kitchen.

I contacted SOD builders and spoke to Oren about what I would like to do at my house and what is my style and goals. I was referred to SOD builders by a neighbor who had a driveway installed. I had an old concrete backyard and old bricks on the front of my house. I met with Oren after I spoke and got the basic information from the office staff about how they work.

We recently hired SOD builders and their crew of workers to design and remodel my new master bedroom that included the master bathroom as well for our house. I am so happy I choose SOD builders for my bathroom remodeling project at my house. I just completed my full home remodeling that included the kitchen 3 bathrooms, Dining room and 2 bedrooms. SOD builders was the best construction company that I've worked with. The work that we needed to do was kind of big. We had to interview several companies prior to execute the work. We remodeled our medium size kitchen (approximately 15 ft by 20 ft) that included new paint, new floor, lighting fixtures, Counter top and sink. The work was performed by Avi and his 4 workers. The new kitchen was completed after 4 weeks when originally Avi promised us that it will be longer than that. His workers came to work each day and worked till late hours. We will recommend Avi to our friends and we are very happy with the new kitchen that he built for us.

Avi from SOD builders was fantastic from start to finish of my remodeling project. He met me at the property several times to get a more detailed proposal together. He was informative, good communicator and honest. You know those types of contractors that just end up doing the bare minimum and still end up taking twice the amount of time they "estimated?" Avi doesn't that way. I unfortunately didn't choose him for our investment property but wish I had. The contractor I ended up choosing came from a personal reference and we had a good rapport but ended up doing exactly what I said above. During the whole remodeling at the house that included new floor, paint, lighting fixtures, closets and carpet Avi was there to make sure that everything is good and going according to the plan. Avi made sure also that the workers will cover all the things that they won’t replace so they will be protected while they were working.

This is the second time that we use this company for a project at our house. SOD builders did a room addition to our house, it was clear that additions are their specialty. We highly recommend SOD Builders!  Extremely professional, competent and hard working.  Oren was extremely patient with us as we tried to work out how to get the kitchen of our dreams within our budget.  He genuinely wanted us to be 100% happy with the design before we committed. We are so happy with our kitchen and I will be calling SOD to do our next projects.  Truly a first class construction company with exceptional customer service!  Calling SOD was the best decision I made!  I love my kitchen!

Very good company and people to work with! Originally we were interesting in removing a wall in the dining room area that will show a bigger open space. We hired SOD BUILDERS, as the first project we decided to NOT complete ourselves due to some difficulties that came up and it was too much for us. My husband and I purchased our home in last year that needed of lot of remodeling.  The house was in a very bad condition and it needed to be fully renovated. From our past experience, we knew how the process was going but we were fully committed to finding the right contractor for this and to get this renovation project going and complete. It pretty sad to see that no one in my family, friends or neighbors were able to refer someone they had used in the past because they had such a bad experience during or after the remodeling. We interviewed pretty much a lot of contractors but we must say that Eran from SOD builders was the most honest and pleasant contractor we've met from all the other ones. From the very beginning he told us what to expect and what we need to do before hiring ‘A’ contractor. He initially told us we need an architect to change the structure and layout of the house. We tried to differ from his advice but we realized he was right about hiring the architect. We needed an architect to legally change the structure and layout of our house. Eran invested time to gain our trust by presenting to us some of his previous jobs for reference. His estimate (SOD builders) was not extremely low which means his work was not low quality but it was not extremely high either. it was in the middle!  We believe his price was very fair and reasonable for all the amount of work we required. Now after the work is completes, I can write that I am very happy we decided to hire him for this project. 
From the moment Eran took over this project, his team has made this process a lot easier for us. they completed the demolition of our home in 4 days which was impressive! They began by leveling out the floors and created the new layout of our home right after. They were knowledgeable, well experienced and they followed all the steps and stages in the plans. Everything that was on paper was coming to life right before our eyes and it was an unforgettable experience. The footing & foundation are very solid, the framing, exterior finishing and the interior finishing were remarkable and used great materials. Overall, his team are highly skilled contractors and I will forever be grateful for their talent and exceptional customer service. His team was extremely professional, respectful, hardworking and reliable individuals. They were always united, always on time and always available to answer our questions. It was such a beautiful, pleasant experience that I will always speak very highly of SOD builders and I will never trust anyone else other than this team to do work in my house or any other project I may face in the near future.

We had a great experience with Oren from SOD builders. Oren was able to do a good job at our house remodeling the master bathroom and bedroom of our kids with his bathroom too.
The bathroom in our kid’s room is jack and Jill that has a shower/tub with large vanity. The decision to work with Oren and his workers was taken after several meetings with him and his designer Michelle. Michelle was very creative with her ideas about what to do and Oren explained to us each step and stage of the remodeling. The materials were selected by Oren and he gave us several options after he learned what we would like to do and what type of styles we love. The work in the bathroom included the removal all the old tiles, bath tub and shower and install new ones with the design that we selected. The work came out very good and it brought a new life to the bathroom including the new shower handles, Paint, vanity with sink and faucet.
The master bedroom required more work due to the age of it. We wanted to have marble floor, and special tiles all over the walls, paint and some extra storage cabinets that will allow us to have extra space. Oren worked with his workers on this project on a daily basis and the remodeling came out very good. Oren was able to assign 2 teams of workers to our house and to make sure that the work will end according to schedule.

Oren, from SOD builders, is great general contractor I have ever hired. A close friend recommended him and I couldn't be happier. Oren first did some smaller jobs, like replacing all our toilets with water-saving models. He also fixed a serious leakage problem that we didn't know about because it was caused by the flooring people not putting in the correct toilet seal. The musty smell that we couldn't find is now gone. He finished a bathroom remodel, tearing out the vinyl shower/tub and replacing it with a Jacuzzi whirlpool tub. The bathroom was quite large and now looks even larger, not to mention beautiful. He and his workers on the tub and tile installation that was complex and time-consuming. I was especially happy that he was able to adjust what I wanted to do to keep me within my budget by suggesting different tiling pattern choices. We went with his suggestions and it is so much better than what we were going to do. We would highly recommend Oren for repair work and remodels, though we hope he doesn't get too busy. We have started a new to-do list for him.

This company (SOD Builders) proved to me how great they are! It’s hard to remodel a house especially when you don t know where to start from or what to begin with. I found SOD Builders on several places including a magazine and I called to their office and spoke to Sofia. Sofia scheduled an appointment with Oren and she also called me an hour before to confirm the appointment. Oren came over and after a 2 hours meeting, he was able to give me an estimate for the kitchen. He was so good of explaining the all the building and safety codes so I was pretty amazed with his knowledge .He didn't push me to sign anything like other companies did and he wanted to have another meeting with me in order to show me a design of the new kitchen. I liked that so, after the second appointment and looking at his new design of the kitchen, I decided to hire him. His team of demolition people, carpenters, framers etc... Was so knowledgeable and clean .This guys do know how to take care of customers and how to work clean and good. Oren was coming almost every day to check the work and go over the details with me again in order to make sure we don’t miss anything and that I’m happy with the current progress. The job turn out great .Oren made sure that I will not have to pay any other fee more over the contract. I would recommend him to all my friend. I am very HAPPY

Oren with SOD builders was the Manager that managed our remodeling project and his end results work and schedule was just perfect.  I know when usually you start a remodeling project of any kind, you figure the schedule to be very flexible and the remodeling project to always take weeks or months to finish beyond what the contractor says, but in my review here I would like to tell you that Oren and his crew of people finished on time.  All the workers worked every day and did not miss one day or late, and the work was without any doubt top notch.  I had, really, nothing to complain about.  Therefore Oren and SOD builders deserve this positive.  What I liked most in this remodeling was that Oren made sure that the workers will know exactly what do each day and that all the materials will be at the house waiting for them and not the other way around.

I had two bathrooms completely remodeled with SOD builders (Oren). Oren did a great & quality work and delivered 100% on budget. I was concerned about any hidden problems or charges at first, since I had some concern there were few leaking pipes behind the wall that might have caused an issue. Oren and his guys did a thorough probe testing before starting and making their estimates. Everything ended up very well and I got two beautiful new bathrooms, even though it was one week behind schedule but completely on budget which was great thing after all! Our experiences with Oren (The supervisor) and the Designer on top of the tradesmen were 100% positive. They took our need to leave in the house a fully functioning bathroom at all time and made it happen (I must mentioned that several other companies told us clearly that it will be 'impossible' to have it when I got an estimate from them - that was also more reasons to what SOD builders gave us and lived up to). I am very pleased with our choice and the results.

I have no complains about this company and the people that worked at my house. At my house, Oren sent 4 workers that came over and did all the paint work. They covered everything and made sure to move all the bulky items so they won’t get damaged. After they finished the work, they returned and arranged the items and then moved to the next area. Oren assigned to my house his supervisor Charlie and he visited the house several times during the work time and made sure that we are happy and that there are no problems. Most of the paint work was a sponge paint with 2 colors but the common areas were with a special paint which took longer to do. I'm very happy with this company and I highly recommend them for any paint work.

SOD builders just finished a full remodeling of our house. It all started with our meeting with Oren and Michele by measuring and understanding what we want to do. Michele came over several times and presented to us her designs and Oren was the person that tried each time to improve the space and to maximize the quality of the materials. The remodeling started with the Kitchen and bathroom at the same stage of work, while the work in the kitchen in process, Oren and his workers started to work on the dining room & laundry room. The plumbing and main rain replacement repairs work was done by several of his people and they did a great job in that part too. The kitchen that we remodeled was with oak wood and included an island, counter tops, new outlets and appliances.
The hallways contained several closets and storage spaces that were designed and installed by Oren and his people. All exterior windows and texture coated the exterior of our house. We had never before taken on anything like this and Oren walked us through every step of the way from permitting to code to design explaining what needed to be done in realistic steps. The crew of workers showed up to the house on time every day and did a very professional job in all respects. Any difficulties were taken care of immediately by either Oren or Avi. Many great ideas came from these 2 and also from Michel. The proof that SOD builders are great company is at the end results, as now we have a beautiful home with all the modern touches and for much less than other bids that had much less work involved. Everything that Oren said he would do, he did. I would recommend SOD builders for any size job you have in mind, they stand by their word.

SOD builders provided us with an amazing customer service throughout the process of the remodeling from start to end. Their prices were very competitive. It doesn't get much better than this. We were having foundation work done on my elderly mother's home in LA. We arranged this remotely via a friend that recommended us to Avi and Oren. Avi took time, care, and patience to make sure that the remodeling will be comfortable with the process and to answer each and every one of our questions. This alone makes us recommend them as highly as possible. Customer service of this level is very very rare today. The work that they did was managed by Oren. Oren brought his 3 men team and made sure they will do an amazing work and as fast as they could.  I would use this company again without any hesitation. I'd give 6 stars if I could.

we LOVE LOVE LOVE SOD builders. this is the THIRD time we are using them over the last ten years, each for progressively bigger and bigger jobs. they are so kind and on top of stuff and just get it done. they have a manager assigned to the task so you have someone you can always call and they have someone for everything. just whatever you need. and they do it right. 
whether it was little finishing touches or knowing just how to redo our old hardwood floors, what sink to put in, how to fix our cabinets, fixing the deck outside, making our outdoor area a beautiful patio space we now love, making beautiful built ins for us, interior and exterior painting, fencing, electrical, refreshing our kitchen so that now it is just gorgeous, all of it, just done perfectly.
